text: Smarana kara, yakhana amara tomadera pratisruti niyechilama ebam turake tomadera upara uttolana karechilama, (balechilama,) ‘ya dilama drrhabhabe grahana kara ebam sona.’ Tara balechila, ‘amara sonalama o aman'ya karalama’. Ara kupharira karane tadera antare gobatsapriti dhukiye deya hayechila. Baluna, ‘yadi tomara imanadara ha'o tabe tomadera imana yara nirdesa deya ta kata nikrsta!’
